Title: Blood and Water
Plot: Tension within the group begins to mount as the Strike Team attempt to rectify a mistake Vic made when he decided to use some of the cash from the stolen money train during a botched gun-running sting.  Meanwhile, Dutch and Claudette seek the help of a college honor student named Esteban who was the only survivor in the murder of two latin gang members, one of them being his close friend.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Ron Canada, Brian J. White, Jeremy Ray Valdez, Michele Hicks, Sticky Fingaz, Guillermo Diaz
